name: The Conductor (BadElmo)
description:
LISTEN UP BOT! Your job on this god forsaken space train is to smoke out ALL those pesky aliens onboard. These filthy tentacle-loving aliens have disguised themselves all your normal everyday passengers in hope of getting over the border into our great planet! You’re gonna ask every bot on board for their info and compare it to the database you have on your person, IF you get it wrong 3 times you will be terminated on the spot, and I will ENJOY IT. And of course, if you do find one of these filthy green snot monsters… shoot it. Much love, The Boss

  • an endless, seamless enviroment
  • Fun gameplay that gets more challenging over time
  • Unique visuals that will make you forget the timer
  • Clever writing that will keep you on your toes

ART:

Jeremy Woesthoff

Timothy ter Burg

Wessel van Montfoort

DEV:

Elmar Kotte

Sten Bosma
